__e: The Comte de Rochefort and I are old friends.
Only the Prince, the Count and I know how to get in and out.
-This is the Count, and this is...
She gave it to me under the impression that I was de Wardes.
It wasn't the Count de Wardes you hate who came to you last night.
Listen, we need you to tell us everything you know about... The count of Saint Germain.
On the count of three, we'll let each other go.
On the count of three, open your eyes and tell me what you see.
Though an underling, I believe you did far more than Count Odo to preserve and defend our city.
And I am also very glad that I have placed my faith in you, Count Odo, as well as in God Almighty, for the successful outcome of this matter.
If you care for me at all, Count Odo, you will bring me his head.
Because he's the Earl and I'm not.
If she's the Count's daughter our business is finished
The Count told me that you...
The count told me it was locked in here.
